verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: backed] [ARG1: two successful U.S. Senate nominees] [ARGM-LOC: in Pennsylvania and Nebraska , which were among four states holding primaries Tuesday] .
President Donald Trump backed two successful U.S. Senate nominees in [ARG1: Pennsylvania and Nebraska] , [R-ARG1: which] [V: were] [ARG2: among four states holding primaries Tuesday] .
President Donald Trump backed two successful U.S. Senate nominees in Pennsylvania and Nebraska , which were among [ARG0: four states] [V: holding] [ARG1: primaries] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
